numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed the percentage of players of color.
2. I noticed the percentage of head coaches of color.
3. In the WNBA, the percentage of players of color is the same as in the NBA.
4. I wonder why baseball has the lowest percentage of people of color.
6. The head coaches are not diverse.
7. The percentage of head coaches of color is low.
8. Many people aspire to be successful in life.
9. Some people want to play baseball.
10. The percentage of people of color in baseball is not high.
11. If diversity is low, then many people cannot enter a baseball league.
12. If diversity is low, then many people cannot become a coach.
13. The graph shows several sports leagues.
14. In about half of the leagues, the percentage of people of color is low.
15. A person has a skin color.
16. A person may not be accepted for a certain role because of the skin color of the person.
17. The headline is: Are sports really diverse within society?
